name: An inconspicuous trail of flowers leads you to a find you aren't sure what to make of
name_original: An inconspicuous trail of flowers leads you to a find you aren't sure what to make of
description:
A trained huntsman lies in wait readying himself to put down his assigned target which may or may not have happened to be one the remaining carriers of a nearly eradicated infectious zombification disease.

Art and story by Leafeon4231

Score and proofreading by Lilina

Thumbnail by freepik (https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/gradient-abstract-mountain-background-design...)
